entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] How-to add dotnet component into existing JavaScript application #80098
    8.0.0
  • ArrayTypeMismatchException in nested arrays with function pointers (android) #80095
    7.0.x
  • Add export for `GetCLRRuntimeHost` to singlefilehost? #80092

Closed

  • Use RID-layout for OS configurations in libraries #32451
    Future
  • Subtraction of -25893.178 from -25893.179 returns value with extra precision #80101
  • [mono][release/7.0] build libs for android arm64 failed on ubuntu #78141
  • Better diagnostics for coreclr initialization failures #70211
    Future
  • Document System.Net.Quic prerequisites and supported OSes #80001
  • [Weird] HTTP/3 does not work after publishing app, but works on debug and release #79727
  • HTTP/3 checker website claims it supports HTTP/3, but HttpClient throws VER_NEG_ERROR #79729
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringEquality #79617
  • Singleton service becomes transient when typed HttpClient is injected #80089

PullRequests

Created

  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80105
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable CoreCLR init failure logging in single exe host #80104
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable AOT-ing a few assemblies in the System.Runtime tests t… #80103
  • Clean-up ILLink targets and avoid binplacing #80102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ignore SendMessageTimeout failures on Windows Nano Server #80099
    area-System.Runtime
  • Ignore uninstantiated generic method #80096
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics
  • Generate fewer `ExactMethodInstantiationsHashtable` entries #80090
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Use shipping runtime.json for RID targeting #80074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • * Registry.GetSubKeyNames : Remove List copy to Array #79345
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in MultipartContent #79788
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in WebSocketValidate #79974
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Resolve generic virtual methods in managed type system #80035
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable struct promotion for structs with SIMD12 fields #79151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • It would be useful to have option for not generating TargetPlatformAttribute / SupportedOSPlatformAttribute #14836
    Backlog

Updated

  • Scripts breaking after upgrade to .NET 7 due to missing classes from System.Security.Cryptography #29325

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add escape switch for TargetPlatform and SupportedOS attributes #29698
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [DO NOT MERGE] [release/7.0.1xx] Inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29636
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False-positive in GetUsedAssemblyReferences #66188
  • Attribute argument of a type containing function pointer fails with `TypeLoadException` during reflection #66187

Closed

  • Syntax highlight breaks down when scrolling with sticky scroll headers enabled #66186
  • Decimal default parameter value is not propagated to the synthesized delegate #65728
  • Analyzer warnings disappear from Error List when the file with the warning is opened #26817
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • fix ignoring [MaybeNull] during type inference #66190
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing document in method debug info #66183
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Adding ability for DeclarationModifiers class to support readonly structs and methods #66169
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Skip implicit build optimization for false value of `OptimizeImplicitlyTriggeredBuild` #66182
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add tag trough OutputCacheAttribute #45842
  • stop linking wasm native references with --allow-undefined to warn from bugged behavior #45841
  • `RequestDelegateMetadataResult.CachedFactoryContext` is unused, resulting in unnecessary work #45840
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md - busted anchor link and incorrect step numbering #45839
  • Build fails on Mac M1 with "ENOENT: no such file or directory" due to selenium-standalone #45838
  • Optimize RenderBatchWriter for empty diffs #45831

Closed

  • Allow passing the "ui_locales" parameters for Azure AD B2C flows in Blazor WebAssembly with MSAL #45832
  • SignalR Websocket Is Never Closed #45834
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json #45826
  • Perf improvement: stage1vanilla #45829
  • Perf regression: endpoint #45830
  • VS Code - Cannot debug blazor wasm client projetc : Unable to lauch browser "The URL's protocol must be one of ws, wss or ws+inix" #45814
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext #45822

PullRequests

Created

  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [docs] BuildFromSource.md fixes + edit pass #45828
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2077486 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Quarantine Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #45812
    area-runtime
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fluent API support #12380
  • Base64 string image source not working on iOS #12379
  • Support OSM by MAUI MapControl #12378
  • Maui for Windows freezes when resizing Entry control for email address #12377

Closed

  • Opacity not applied to BoxView and Frame #10503
    Backlog
  • Frame.Opacity has no Effect #10220
    Backlog
  • TranslationY does not work on Frame component #8840
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow CommunityToolkit to avoid reflection to access the CollectionView controller #12258
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Initial Commit for third party notice file #12321
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12356
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Don't watch for changes on an ImmutableBrush #12346
  • Update Essentials SecureStorage API Docs #12360
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Use interpreted dynamic delegates when they're invoked just once, instead of compiling #29814
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Invalid object name 'AspNetUserRole'. #29945
  • EF throws weird exception #29956

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #29964
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Switch to interpreted delegates for one-off invocations #29815
  • Minor test refactoring and enabling #29958

Updated

  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949
  • Long and ULong properties marked as rowversion automatically convert to binary on SQL Server #29961
